snippet.title: Lifing features trailer
snippet.description:
More info and wishlist option at: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1684870/Lifing/

Lifing is a fun turn-card-roguelike base game, set in a mix of fantasy/sci fi/random universe breaking limits of card and deck manipulation. Explore, fight, upgrade, repeat.

Release date: 22 October.
